nodes.title: Dependency Updates - Spring Boot to 1.5.6, Spring core to 4.3.10, Lombok to 1.16.18
Registration Password only accepts 6 or more non-space characters
Theme Fields now have the ability to have translations added in the admin
Fixed issue where items were unable to be added to wishlist when out of stock
Update OrderHistory UI to use new MaterialKit styles
Add State/Province/Region, PostalCode, and PhoneNumber Empty/Whitespace check to Common Address Validator.
Added ability to have an amount off offer split among the matching order items
Add support to `ExtensionHandler` to get a list of `cacheKeys` for a template site
Fixed errors with checkout flow
Introduce ability to disable customer saved payments
Update Homepage banner add wording since the link is no longer active
Add property source, message bundles, module registration and AutoImportSQL interfaces for backwards and forwards compatibility with the Broadleaf 5.x line
Added a null check when determining correct AdminSection
Fix url forwarding issue for products, categories, & skus
Fixed issue where rating service was incorrectly counting duplicates for the average rating
Consolidate the mbeans configuration and ensure one is marked primary to fix Spring Boot Mbeans exposure
Allow UTF-8 characters (like accent marks) in message bundles
Introduce methods to determine whether or not the current cart has a CreditCard payment associated to it
Update our OOB Page data to include meta titles & introduce a plain page template
Outstanding issues with catalog and profile propagation setup and usage
Outstanding issues with catalog and profile propagation setup and usage
Add method to the framework to query products that use a specific product option
Outstanding issues with catalog and profile propagation setup and usage
Core BLCAdmin JS references enterprise only components
Fixed JS error that occurs in IE when clearing filters on Main Entity ListGrids because a variable was not converted to a JQuery object
Ensure that the BRC is configured for resource resolving
Add site id to the cache key to prevent incorrect lookups when an installation has multiple sites available
Fill In Saved Customer Addresses
Misc Issues
Default Category validations triggering when re-deploying "incomplete" products
Default Category validations triggering when re-deploying "incomplete" products
Sku#getMultiValueSkuAttributes has inaccurate return type
Fixed an issue where overriding a product's additional sku would cause the add to cart to fail (MT Only)
Check that the order item can be cast to a SkuAccessor before casting in the Google Analytics module
SKU Modal tabs not lazy loading
Enabled entityManager.find() catalog validation when grabbing a page entity.
Make integration test retry loop exit as soon as possible
When creating a new entities in the admin with a generated URL, the URL keeps a period appended at the end
Adjust max height of order listgrids in the admin
Fixed issue where index fields and other entities were not copied for synced copy catalogs
When Custom Validator fails validation on Sku add, an NPE occurs when hasDefaultSku is called
Remove the cloning of OfferCode when cloning an Order.
Make dynamic pricing more efficient during cart processing
Use built in parameters of the establishThinRequestContext to ignore sandbox changes when getting theme
Make dynamic pricing more efficient during cart processing
Added sku to the configurable order item request
Added extension point to allow easier modifications of solr field names
Not able to Sort Products by Parent Category
Content Items in the admin are only pulling in content data for up to the max results (50)
Enhance ClassTransformer flexibility
Enhance ClassTransformer flexibility to allow with Persistence Unit it will influence and conditional class transformation
Enhance ClassTransformer flexibility
Finding Sku Options in Community was failing due to the query looking at archiveStatus
Community - Save Button does not re-enable when correcting validation errors on Product add
Community: Images not appearing in the Media Asset edit view
Enhance ClassTransformer flexibility
Property VisibilityEnum#VISIBLE_ALL does not work properly
Community: New Simple Template not working
Community - 404 Page not shown when trying to find PageImpl that was deleted
Added ability to force customers to change their passwords
Upgrade insecure third party libraries
Introduce Future Credit feature to Offer engine that allows adjustments to be ignored at order time and should be credited later.
ReferenceSite - If cart has errors validated during checkout, user gets redirected to login page instead of displaying error message

Enhanced FieldDefinition fields with `@AdminPresentation` so that they could be overridden, and added more field types to DynamicSupportedFieldTypes enumeration so that more basic fields are available in the admin.
Enhance pageField map to allow programatic maintenance
Bug with AdminUserProvisioningService
Sanitize log output to prevent log forgery
SystemPropertiesServiceImpl uses the Spring Environment inefficiently
Field discovery in BLCFieldUtils is not efficient
Certain rule operator combinations can break rule builder evaluation
Misc Enhancements
Use the raw product option value to get skus when adding to cart instead of the translated value.
Product Add-Ons Don't Allow Separate Skus
Update Spring and Spring Boot to the latest 4.3.12 and 1.5.8
Offers Not Applied to Products with Comma in Name
Not able to edit Primary image meta data in admin
Fixed "Error While Parsing Rule" for "is between" date rules via rule builder.
Added "Within x days" operator for date rules that checks if the field date is within the specified number of days from the date at time of evaluation.
Added in better support for Email and SMS notifications
Added functionality to allow offers to be configured to only limit customer usage within a certain number of days before reuse.
Add setters in ExampleBean of MergeBeanDefinitionTest
SKU Modal tabs not lazy loading
Page field translations via admin ui persist with wrong entity type
When calculating target quantity for tiered offers, we need to also factor in the number of qualifying item iterations.
Content Targeter page variable error
Fixed a warning being issued by an unrequired constructor for NotificationDispatcher
Fixed issue where a system property was incorrectly cached as null when resolved in multiple ways
Remove subclasses of domain objects that appear as properties in other beans
Redactor widget not styling text
Fixed issue where debugQuery=true was passed to Solr on every single query
ListGrid bugfix involving listgrid template and ListGrid.hideIdColumn
IgnoreSite state can be left on the BroadleafRequestContext for static asset related calls
Google CDN does not recognize .js and .css files
Image corruption can occur when multiple treatments for the same image are requested concurrently
Image corruption can occur when multiple treatments for the same image are requested concurrently
Error when adding an image on a product with changes
Consolidate orders across non-registered customers upon registration
Set url null for add-on product
Change configuration is still an active link on Order Confirmation page
Update Spring, Spring Boot and Jackson dependencies to the latest patch releases (4.3.14, 1.5.10, 2.8.11)
